thread.title: Twitter Let Jokes Fly When They Found Out Matt Barnes Drove 95 Miles to Fight Derek Fisher
thread.title_full: Twitter Let Jokes Fly When They Found Out Matt Barnes Drove 95 Miles to Fight Derek Fisher | Complex UK

author: Angel Diaz
title: Twitter Let Jokes Fly When They Found Out Matt Barnes Drove 95 Miles to Fight Derek Fisher
text:
If you haven't heard, Grizzlies forward Matt Barnes drove 95 miles from Santa Barbara, Calif. to Los Angeles recently to fight former teammate Derek Fisher upon hearing the Knicks head coach was at Barnes' ex-wife Gloria Govan 's house. The New York Post is reporting that Fish has been dating Ms. Govan for "a few months" and doesn't plan on pressing any charges. With Roy Hibbert getting slapped yesterday, the Stephen A. Smith and Kevin Durant beef , the ESPN Kobe ranking, and this situation, the 2016 NBA Preseason is going down in the history books as one of the best.
Naturally, Twitter erupted in chaos and let the jokes fly because fuck facts. Barnes driving all that way to give Fisher the hands is eerily similar to last season's Temecula Gate . It also didn't help that he lied about dating Rihanna . Matt Barnes has been taking mad Ls lately. He's fed up! Anyway, we snatched up some of the funniest tweets regarding the situation. Check 'em out below:
Barnes drove to Temecula
— Irv (@thisisIRV) October 7, 2015 I know when that hotline bling pic.twitter.com/r5fULj77gf
— Kenny Ducey (@KennyDucey) October 7, 2015 pic.twitter.com/Ne9VllK0pV
— W.E.B.B.I.E DuBois (@fivefifths) October 7, 2015 “How’s the wife?“ pic.twitter.com/DlDj27XBXP
— Al Drevis (@UncleHemp) October 7, 2015 so in last 2 months #mattbarnes lied on his d**k about smashing Rihanna and ran up on his ex wife new man.... pic.twitter.com/qQyQytywvy
— COCAINE APT RENTER (@iAmJeffSledge) October 7, 2015 "I beat 94 miles ago" pic.twitter.com/P0cfEv8mO2
— Deola (@DeolaCola) October 7, 2015 Melo aint letting Lala no where near the garden this season my g.
— Desus Nice (@desusnice) October 7, 2015 MATT BARNES WITH THE PUERO RICANEST MOVE I SEEN IN A MINUTE. HOMIE DROVE 100 MILES TO BEAT UP HIS EXES NEW MAN SMH
— The Kid Mero (@THEKIDMERO) October 7, 2015 derek fisher twitpics his feet in some gucci flip-flops and the knicks might win the east.
— neil mccauley (@the_blueprint) October 7, 2015 "Be real with me Melo, you would too right? RIGHT?" pic.twitter.com/zm6nvGGMiE
— LowKeyUHTN (@LowKeyUHTN) October 7, 2015 "Yo D, Matt Barnes just pulled up" pic.twitter.com/P4B9tlN7Vg
— LizzLocker (@Lizzs_Lockeroom) October 7, 2015 Between Stephen A and KD, Roy Hibbert getting slapped up, and now Fisher isolating Matt Barnes ex-wife, this is the best NBA preseason EVER.
— There's No E In Cory (@CoryTownes) October 7, 2015
